Name: Engine Upgrade
Describe: Collector UFO movement speed is increased.

Name: Turbine Upgrade
Describe: Increases the speed of pulling back the hunter grapping hook

Name: Magnetic Modification
Describe: <color=#555b7d>※Swap with the Rend Modification. Purchase points to swap.</color> The grapping hook will attract resources along the way.

Name: Rend Modification
Describe: <color=#555b7d>※Swap with the Magnetic Modification. Purchase points to swap.</color> The grapping hook will catch resources within range.

Name: Laser Modification
Describe: Hook is now equipped with an aim-assist device.
